Description: Sherd of wall of North Ionian pottery bowl or the like; glaze mostly fired orange-brown. Inside glazed with added red band lined in white; exterior: goat grazing to right (foreparts only) with rosettes as fill; below, fine line and black band with added white at break.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.931)
